annotation.spsInternal: SPS INTERNAL: convert EDIFACT: 9; convert Grocery: N; convert Logistics: A,F,J,N
SPS INTERNAL: convert GeneralMerchandise: BEG02 = TR; convert Logistics: F

annotation.longDescription: Used when the document should be treated as a full replacement of a previous transmission
annotation.spsInternal: SPS INTERNAL: convert Grocery: R; convert Logistics: R
SPS INTERNAL: convert Grocery: C; convert GeneralMerchandise: 22; convert Logistics: C

annotation.longDescription: Indicates the finalized version of the document and that no additional updates or changes will occur
Used by the ordering party to indicate that an order is complete and should not be further fulfilled, or by the order recipient indicating that they have fulfilled the order to completion.
